thread.title: Marion Bird
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by Marion Bird

author: Marion Bird
title: Marion Bird
text:
Wow not normally a person to write reviews, but this was simply superb service from start to finish.
Value for money and kept informed from the start to the finish. The garage that serviced the car even did a free mini valet on the car. Think they saw I was an older gentleman and added that extra little touch. Not saying this is a normal service but oh boy did it make an impression.
Booked in for service again next year at the same discounted price held for a year. The savings on the service are genuine as checked like for like at local garages and half didn't offer half the checks on the list from service stop.
